revised_title: Observations of the January 8th, 1734/5 Storm and its Impact on Barometer Readings
tldr: Henry Forth writes to Reverend William Derham about the storm that occurred on January 8th, 1734/5, and its impact on barometer readings in his region. He discusses the weather conditions, including snow and sleet, and the fluctuations in barometric pressure during the storm.
